verses.verse: שִׁמְע֤וּ <S%H8085><s%> shim-'U Listen אִיִּים֙ <S%H339><s%> 'i-Yim O isles אֵלַ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, and to וְהַקְשִׁ֥יבוּ <S%H7181><s%> ve-hak-Shi-vu unto me and hearken לְאֻמִּ֖ים <S%H3816><s%> le-'um-Mim ye people מֵרָח֑וֹק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok; from far יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh The LORD מִבֶּ֣טֶן <S%H990><s%> mib-Be-ten me from the womb קְרָאָ֔נִי <S%H7121><s%> ke-ra-'A-ni, hath called מִמְּעֵ֥י <S%H4578><s%> mi-me-'Ei from the bowels אִמִּ֖י <S%H517><s%> 'im-Mi of my mother הִזְכִּ֥יר <S%H2142><s%> hiz-Kir hath he made mention שְׁמִֽי׃ <S%H8034><s%> she-Mi. of my name

וַיָּ֤שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem And he hath made פִּי֙ <S%H6310><s%> pi my mouth כְּחֶ֣רֶב <S%H2719><s%> ke-Che-rev sword חַדָּ֔ה <S%H2299><s%> chad-Dah, like a sharp בְּצֵ֥ל <S%H6738><s%> be-Tzel in the shadow יָד֖וֹ <S%H3027><s%> ya-Do of his hand הֶחְבִּיאָ֑נִי <S%H2244><s%> hech-bi-'A-ni; hath he hid וַיְשִׂימֵ֙נִי֙ <S%H7760><s%> vay-si-Me-ni me and made לְחֵ֣ץ <S%H2671><s%> le-Chetz shaft בָּר֔וּר <S%H1305><s%> ba-Rur, me a polished בְּאַשְׁפָּת֖וֹ <S%H827><s%> be-'ash-pa-To in his quiver הִסְתִּירָֽנִי׃ <S%H5641><s%> his-ti-Ra-ni. hath he hid

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And said לִ֖י li עַבְדִּי־ <S%H5650><s%> 'av-di- unto me Thou [art] my servant אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you יִשְׂרָאֵ֕ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El O Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- Whom בְּךָ֖ be-Cha אֶתְפָּאָֽר׃ <S%H6286><s%> 'et-pa-'Ar. in whom I will be glorified

וַאֲנִ֤י <S%H589><s%> va-'a-Ni I אָמַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar-ti Then I said לְרִ֣יק <S%H7385><s%> le-Rik in vain יָגַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3021><s%> ya-Ga'-ti, I have laboured לְתֹ֥הוּ <S%H8414><s%> le-To-hu for nought וְהֶ֖בֶל <S%H1892><s%> ve-He-vel and in vain כֹּחִ֣י <S%H3581><s%> ko-Chi my strength כִלֵּ֑יתִי <S%H3615><s%> chil-Lei-ti; I have spent אָכֵן֙ <S%H403><s%> 'a-Chen [yet] surely מִשְׁפָּטִ֣י <S%H4941><s%> mish-pa-Ti my judgment אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- is with יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, [is] with the LORD וּפְעֻלָּתִ֖י <S%H6468><s%> u-fe-'ul-la-Ti and my work אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> 'et- with אֱלֹהָֽי׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hai. with my God

וְעַתָּ֣ה׀ <S%H6258><s%> ve-'at-Tah and now אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar And now saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God יֹצְרִ֤י <S%H3335><s%> yo-tze-Ri that formed מִבֶּ֙טֶן֙ <S%H990><s%> mib-Be-ten me from the womb לְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> le-'E-ved [to be] his servant ל֔וֹ lo, לְשׁוֹבֵ֤ב <S%H7725><s%> le-sho-Vev again יַֽעֲקֹב֙ <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko Jacob אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> ve-Yis-ra-'El to him Though Israel; לֹא lo כלֹ֣ו <S%H3808><s%> Lo not קיֵאָסֵ֑ף <S%H622><s%> ye-'a-Sef; be not gathered וְאֶכָּבֵד֙ <S%H3513><s%> ve-'ek-ka-Ved yet shall I be glorious בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the eyes יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh, God וֵאלֹהַ֖י <S%H430><s%> ve-lo-Hai and my God הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become עֻזִּֽי׃ <S%H5797><s%> 'uz-Zi. shall be my strength

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, And he said נָקֵ֨ל <S%H7043><s%> na-Kel It is a light thing מִֽהְיוֹתְךָ֥ <S%H1961><s%> mih-yot-Cha may reach לִי֙ li עֶ֔בֶד <S%H5650><s%> 'E-ved, that thou shouldest be my servant לְהָקִים֙ <S%H6965><s%> le-ha-Kim to raise up אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei the tribes יַעֲקֹ֔ב <S%H3290><s%> ya-'a-Ko, of Jacob; וּנְצִירֵי u-ne-tzi-rei כוּנְצוּרֵ֥י <S%H5336><s%> u-ne-tzu-Rei preserved קיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לְהָשִׁ֑יב <S%H7725><s%> le-ha-Shiv; and to restore וּנְתַתִּ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5414><s%> u-ne-tat-Ti-cha I will also give לְא֣וֹר <S%H216><s%> le-'or thee for a light גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, to the Gentiles לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot may reach יְשׁוּעָתִ֖י <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Ti that thou mayest be my salvation עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- against קְצֵ֥ה <S%H7097><s%> ke-Tzeh unto the end הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz. of the earth ס sa-Mek

כֹּ֣ה <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָֽמַר־ <S%H559><s%> 'a-mar- Thus saith יְהוָה֩ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD גֹּאֵ֨ל <S%H1350><s%> go-'El the Redeemer יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel קְדוֹשׁ֗וֹ <S%H6918><s%> ke-do-Sho, [and] his Holy One לִבְזֹה־ <S%H960><s%> liv-zoh- despiseth נֶ֜פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> Ne-fesh to him whom man לִמְתָ֤עֵֽב <S%H8581><s%> lim-Ta-'ev abhorreth גּוֹי֙ <S%H1471><s%> goy to him whom the nation לְעֶ֣בֶד <S%H5650><s%> le-'E-ved to a servant מֹשְׁלִ֔ים <S%H4910><s%> mo-she-Lim, of rulers מְלָכִים֙ <S%H4428><s%> me-la-Chim Kings יִרְא֣וּ <S%H7200><s%> yir-'U shall see וָקָ֔מוּ <S%H6965><s%> va-Ka-mu, and arise שָׂרִ֖ים <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rim princes וְיִֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֑וּ <S%H7812><s%> ve-yish-ta-chav-Vu; also shall worship לְמַ֤עַן <S%H4616><s%> le-Ma-'an Because יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh because of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נֶאֱמָ֔ן <S%H539><s%> ne-'e-Man, that is faithful קְדֹ֥שׁ <S%H6918><s%> ke-Dosh [and] the Holy One יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel וַיִּבְחָרֶֽךָּ׃ <S%H977><s%> vai-yiv-cha-Re-ka. and he shall choose

כֹּ֣ה׀ <S%H3541><s%> koh Thus אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD בְּעֵ֤ת <S%H6256><s%> be-'Et time רָצוֹן֙ <S%H7522><s%> ra-tzOn In an acceptable עֲנִיתִ֔יךָ <S%H6030><s%> 'a-ni-Ti-cha, have I heard וּבְי֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> u-ve-Yom thee and in a day יְשׁוּעָ֖ה <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'Ah of salvation עֲזַרְתִּ֑יךָ <S%H5826><s%> 'a-zar-Ti-cha; have I helped וְאֶצָּרְךָ֗ <S%H5341><s%> ve-'etz-tza-re-Cha, thee and I will preserve וְאֶתֶּנְךָ֙ <S%H5414><s%> ve-'et-ten-Cha thee and give לִבְרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> liv-Rit thee for a covenant עָ֔ם <S%H5971><s%> 'Am, of the people לְהָקִ֣ים <S%H6965><s%> le-ha-Kim to establish אֶ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz, the earth לְהַנְחִ֖יל <S%H5157><s%> le-han-Chil to cause to inherit נְחָל֥וֹת <S%H5159><s%> ne-cha-Lot heritages שֹׁמֵמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8074><s%> sho-me-Mot. the desolate

לֵאמֹ֤ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor That thou mayest say לַֽאֲסוּרִים֙ <S%H631><s%> la-'a-su-Rim to the prisoners צֵ֔אוּ <S%H3318><s%> Tze-'u, Go forth לַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> la-'a-Sher after בַּחֹ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H2822><s%> ba-Cho-shech to them that [are] in darkness הִגָּל֑וּ <S%H1540><s%> hig-ga-Lu; Shew עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- Along דְּרָכִ֣ים <S%H1870><s%> de-ra-Chim in the ways יִרְע֔וּ <S%H7462><s%> yir-'U, yourselves They shall feed וּבְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> u-ve-Chol all שְׁפָיִ֖ים <S%H8205><s%> she-fa-Yim [shall be] in all high places מַרְעִיתָֽם׃ <S%H4830><s%> mar-'i-Tam. and their pastures

לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> lo Nor יִרְעָ֙בוּ֙ <S%H7456><s%> yir-'A-vu They shall not hunger וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo Nor יִצְמָ֔אוּ <S%H6770><s%> yitz-Ma-'u, nor thirst וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- Nor יַכֵּ֥ם <S%H5221><s%> yak-Kem smite שָׁרָ֖ב <S%H8273><s%> sha-Rav neither shall the heat וָשָׁ֑מֶשׁ <S%H8121><s%> va-Sha-mesh; nor sun כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מְרַחֲמָ֣ם <S%H7355><s%> me-ra-cha-Mam them for he that hath mercy יְנַהֲגֵ֔ם <S%H5090><s%> ye-na-ha-Gem, on them shall lead וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and מַבּ֥וּעֵי <S%H4002><s%> mab-Bu-'ei them even by the springs מַ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> Ma-yim of water יְנַהֲלֵֽם׃ <S%H5095><s%> ye-na-ha-Lem. shall he guide

וְשַׂמְתִּ֥י <S%H7760><s%> ve-sam-Ti And I will make כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> chol all הָרַ֖י <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rai all my mountains לַדָּ֑רֶךְ <S%H1870><s%> lad-Da-rech; a way וּמְסִלֹּתַ֖י <S%H4546><s%> u-me-sil-lo-Tai and my highways יְרֻמֽוּן׃ <S%H7311><s%> ye-ru-Mun. shall be exalted

הִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> hin-neh- Behold אֵ֕לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these מֵרָח֖וֹק <S%H7350><s%> me-ra-Chok from far יָבֹ֑אוּ <S%H935><s%> ya-Vo-'u; Behold these shall come וְהִֽנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-neh- and lo אֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> 'el-leh these מִצָּפ֣וֹן <S%H6828><s%> mitz-tza-Fon and lo these from the north וּמִיָּ֔ם <S%H3220><s%> u-mi-Yam, and from the west וְאֵ֖לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh and these מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz and these from the land סִינִֽים׃ <S%H5515><s%> si-Nim. of Sinim

רָנּ֤וּ <S%H7442><s%> ran-Nu Sing שָׁמַ֙יִם֙ <S%H8064><s%> sha-Ma-yim O heavens וְגִ֣ילִי <S%H1523><s%> ve-Gi-li and be joyful אָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz, O earth; יִפְצְחוּ yif-tze-chu כוּפִצְח֥וּ <S%H6476><s%> u-fitz-Chu break forth קהָרִ֖ים <S%H2022><s%> ha-Rim O mountains רִנָּ֑ה <S%H7440><s%> rin-Nah; into singing כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for נִחַ֤ם <S%H5162><s%> ni-Cham hath comforted יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh for the LORD עַמּ֔וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo, his people וַעֲנִיָּ֖ו <S%H6041><s%> va-'a-ni-Yav upon his afflicted יְרַחֵֽם׃ <S%H7355><s%> ye-ra-Chem. and will have mercy ס sa-Mek

וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vat-To-mer said צִיּ֖וֹן <S%H6726><s%> tzi-Yon But Zion עֲזָבַ֣נִי <S%H5800><s%> 'a-za-Va-ni hath forsaken יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; The LORD וַאדֹנָ֖י <S%H136><s%> va-do-Nai me and my Lord שְׁכֵחָֽנִי׃ <S%H7911><s%> she-che-Cha-ni. hath forgotten

הֲתִשְׁכַּ֤ח <S%H7911><s%> ha-tish-Kach forget אִשָּׁה֙ <S%H802><s%> 'ish-Shah Can a woman עוּלָ֔הּ <S%H5764><s%> 'u-Lah, her sucking child מֵרַחֵ֖ם <S%H7355><s%> me-ra-Chem that she should not have compassion בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- on the son בִּטְנָ֑הּ <S%H990><s%> bit-Nah; belly גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- again אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh these תִשְׁכַּ֔חְנָה <S%H7911><s%> tish-Kach-nah, yet will I not forget וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> ve-'a-no-Chi I לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo I will not אֶשְׁכָּחֵֽךְ׃ <S%H7911><s%> 'esh-ka-Chech. forget

הֵ֥ן <S%H2005><s%> hen Behold עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on כַּפַּ֖יִם <S%H3709><s%> kap-Pa-yim thee upon the palms of [my] hands חַקֹּתִ֑יךְ <S%H2710><s%> chak-ko-Tich; Behold I have graven חוֹמֹתַ֥יִךְ <S%H2346><s%> cho-mo-Ta-yich thy walls נֶגְדִּ֖י <S%H5048><s%> neg-Di before תָּמִֽיד׃ <S%H8548><s%> ta-Mid. [are] continually

מִֽהֲר֖וּ <S%H4116><s%> mi-ha-Ru shall make haste בָּנָ֑יִךְ <S%H1121><s%> ba-Na-yich; Thy children מְהָֽרְסַ֥יִךְ <S%H2040><s%> me-ha-re-Sa-yich thy destroyers וּמַחֲרִבַ֖יִךְ <S%H2717><s%> u-ma-cha-ri-Va-yich and they that made thee waste מִמֵּ֥ךְ <S%H4480><s%> mi-Mech at יֵצֵֽאוּ׃ <S%H3318><s%> ye-Tze-'u. shall go forth
